languages.text: {n}Устройство было безжалостно уничтожено. В процессе своей гибели оно источало звуки, заставлявшие механизмы сходить с ума и ломаться. Однако с ним было покончено, и вера в торжество Омниссии наполнила сердца праведных.{/n}

{n}The device was mercilessly but carefully destroyed. During its death throes, the device emitted noises that drove other mechanisms to madness and ruin. But it was finished, and faith in the triumph of the Omnissiah filled the hearts of the righteous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Устройство было безжалостно уничтожено. В процессе своей гибели оно источало звуки, заставлявшие механизмы сходить с ума и ломаться. Однако с ним было покончено, и вера в торжество Омниссии наполнила сердца праведных.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The device has been mercilessly, but carefully destroyed. In the process of its death, the device had emitted noises that made the mechanisms go out of control and break. But it was finished, and the faith in the triumph of the Omnissiah had filled the hearts of the righteous people.{/n}

{n}The device has been mercilessly, but carefully destroyed. In the process of its death, the device had emitted noises that made the mechanisms go out of control and break. But it was finished, and the faith in the triumph of the Omnissiah had filled the hearts of the righteous people.{/n}

{n}The device was mercilessly but carefully destroyed. During its death throes, the device emitted noises that drove other mechanisms to madness and ruin. But it was finished, and faith in the triumph of the Omnissiah filled the hearts of the righteous.{/n}

{n}The device has been mercilessly, but carefully destroyed. During its death throes, the device emitted noises causing other mechanisms to lose control and break. But it was finished, and faith in the triumph of the Omnissiah has filled the hearts of the righteous.{/n}

{n}The device was mercilessly but carefully destroyed. During its death throes, the device emitted noises that drove other mechanisms to madness and ruin. But it was finished, and faith in the triumph of the Omnissiah filled the hearts of the righteous.{/n}

{n}The device was mercilessly but carefully destroyed. During its death throes, the device emitted noises that drove other mechanisms to madness and ruin. But it was finished, and faith in the triumph of the Omnissiah filled the hearts of the righteous.{/n}

{n}The device was mercilessly but carefully destroyed. During its death throes, the device emitted noises that drove other mechanisms to madness and ruin. But it was finished, and faith in the triumph of the Omnissiah filled the hearts of the righteous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这台装置被小心翼翼地摧毁了。它垂死挣扎时发出了凄厉的噪音，导致周围的其他装置失控、报废，但到了最后，它还是被消灭掉了。欧姆尼塞亚的这场胜利，大大激励了正义之人心中的虔诚。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The device was mercilessly but carefully destroyed. During its death throes, the device emitted noises that drove other mechanisms to madness and ruin. But it was finished, and faith in the triumph of the Omnissiah filled the hearts of the righteous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这台装置被小心翼翼地摧毁了。它垂死挣扎时发出了凄厉的噪音，导致周围的其他装置失控、报废，但到了最后，它还是被消灭掉了。欧姆尼塞亚的这场胜利，大大激励了正义之人心中的虔诚。{/n}
{n}这台装置被小心翼翼地摧毁了。它垂死挣扎时发出了凄厉的噪音，导致周围的其他装置失控、报废，但到了最后，它还是被消灭掉了。欧姆尼塞亚的这场胜利，大大激励了正义之人心中的虔诚。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El dispositivo se desmanteló sin piedad, pero con cuidado. Durante sus últimos estertores, el artefacto emitió ruidos que empujaron a otros mecanismos a la locura y la ruina. Pero aquel fue su fin, y la fe en el triunfo del Omnissiah llenó los corazones de los justos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The device was mercilessly but carefully destroyed. During its death throes, the device emitted noises that drove other mechanisms to madness and ruin. But it was finished, and faith in the triumph of the Omnissiah filled the hearts of the righteous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El dispositivo se desmanteló sin piedad, pero con cuidado. Durante sus últimos estertores, el artefacto emitió ruidos que empujaron a otros mecanismos a la locura y la ruina. Pero aquel fue su fin, y la fe en el triunfo del Omnissiah llenó los corazones de los justos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}装置は容赦なく、しかし慎重に破壊された。この装置は、死の間際にノイズを発し、それによって他の機構が制御不能に陥って壊れた。しかし、この件は無事終わり、万機神の勝利への信仰が信者の心を満たした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The device was mercilessly but carefully destroyed. During its death throes, the device emitted noises that drove other mechanisms to madness and ruin. But it was finished, and faith in the triumph of the Omnissiah filled the hearts of the righteous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}装置は容赦なく、しかし慎重に破壊された。この装置は、死の間際にノイズを発し、それによって他の機構が制御不能に陥って壊れた。しかし、この件は無事終わり、万機神の勝利への信仰が信者の心を満たした。{/n}
{n}装置は容赦なく、しかし慎重に破壊された。この装置は、死の間際にノイズを発し、それによって他の機構が制御不能に陥って壊れた。しかし、この件は無事終わり、万機神の勝利への信仰が信者の心を満たした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'appareil est détruit avec une application et une minutie redoublées. Durant son agonie, il émet des bruits provoquant dysfonctionnements et dommages dans d'autres mécanismes. L'important est néanmoins qu'il ne pourra plus sévir, et la foi dans le triomphe de l'Omnimessie emplit de joie le cœur des justes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The device was mercilessly but carefully destroyed. During its death throes, the device emitted noises that drove other mechanisms to madness and ruin. But it was finished, and faith in the triumph of the Omnissiah filled the hearts of the righteous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'appareil est détruit avec une application et une minutie redoublées. Durant son agonie, il émet des bruits provoquant dysfonctionnements et dommages dans d'autres mécanismes. L'important est néanmoins qu'il ne pourra plus sévir, et la foi dans le triomphe de l'Omnimessie emplit de joie le cœur des justes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Gerät wurde gnadenlos, aber sorgfältig zerstört. Während seines Todeskampfs gab die Maschine Geräusche ab, die andere Mechanismus in den Wahnsinn trieben und zerstörten. Doch die Maschine starb und der Glaube an den Triumph des Omnissiah erfüllte die Herzen der Rechtschaffenen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The device was mercilessly but carefully destroyed. During its death throes, the device emitted noises that drove other mechanisms to madness and ruin. But it was finished, and faith in the triumph of the Omnissiah filled the hearts of the righteous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Gerät wurde gnadenlos, aber sorgfältig zerstört. Während seines Todeskampfs gab die Maschine Geräusche ab, die andere Mechanismus in den Wahnsinn trieben und zerstörten. Doch die Maschine starb und der Glaube an den Triumph des Omnissiah erfüllte die Herzen der Rechtschaffenen.{/n}

{n}Das Gerät wurde gnadenlos, aber vorsichtig zerstört. Während seines Todeskampfs sonderte die Maschine Geräusche aus, durch die andere Mechanismen die Kontrolle verloren und kaputtgingen. Doch die Maschine starb und der Glaube an den Triumph des Omnissiah erfüllte die Herzen der Rechtschaffenen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cihaz, acımasızca fakat dikkatlice imha edildi. Ölüm döşeğinde çıkardığı sesler, diğer mekanizmaların delirip bozulmasına yol açtı. Ama nihayetinde bu sesler de dindi ve Hermesih'in utkusuna olan inanç, hakşinasların gönüllerine işlendi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The device was mercilessly but carefully destroyed. During its death throes, the device emitted noises that drove other mechanisms to madness and ruin. But it was finished, and faith in the triumph of the Omnissiah filled the hearts of the righteous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cihaz, acımasızca fakat dikkatlice imha edildi. Ölüm döşeğinde çıkardığı sesler, diğer mekanizmaların delirip bozulmasına yol açtı. Ama nihayetinde bu sesler de dindi ve Hermesih'in utkusuna olan inanç, hakşinasların gönüllerine işlendi.{/n}
